testcase.name: should display all product data when all columns are visible
should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-ALL, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)

should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-ONLY-ID, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)
should invoke the onToggle callback after "id" checkbox was clicked
should invoke the onToggle callback after "name" checkbox was clicked
should invoke the onToggle callback after "department" checkbox was clicked
should invoke the onToggle callback after "currency" checkbox was clicked
should invoke the onToggle callback after "price" checkbox was clicked
should display (un)checked column checkboxes after initial render
should invoke the onPriceChange callback after "minimum price" input value changed
should invoke the onPriceChange callback after "maximum price" input value changed
should display the "minimum price" in input according to passed props
should display the "maximum price" in input according to passed props
should display all products if no filters are applied
should display label including number of items
should display product row cells
should display all columns by default
should display 14 products after filtering price between 5 and 100 (correct)
should display 8 products after filtering price between 10 and 1000 (correct)
should display 1 products after filtering price between 7.75 and 7.75 (correct)
